JournalBacklinks.rebuildOnSave.name: Rebuild links on journal save
JournalBacklinks.rebuildOnSave.hint: If unchecked, linking only happens on manual sync. As there is currently no way to manually sync, effectively disables linking.
JournalBacklinks.headingTag.name: Heading tag for links
JournalBacklinks.headingTag.hint:
For

Links

, enter h1. Do not add classes, etc.
JournalBacklinks.minPermission.name: Minimum permission
JournalBacklinks.minPermission.hint: A user needs at least this permission level on the destination for a link to be visible.
JournalBacklinks.debug.name: Debug logging
JournalBacklinks.syncButton.name: Sync entries
JournalBacklinks.syncButton.label: Sync now
